ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup castor sugar or superfine sugar

cookingTips: Use self-rising flour for simplicity; no need to add baking powder separately
Mix ingredients gently to avoid overworking the batter
Check for doneness with a toothpick inserted in the center
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple, four-ingredient loaf. Are you comfortable with the self-rising flour as a one-step leavening agent?
